name: Skennen
description:
Shafts of light pass over a dark field, resulting in noisy, linear illuminations. There is a graphics device involved near the end of the production process (it is that of the NEC PC-88VA). Forever-looping at 30 frames per second.

GIF
640x400
291 frames, 30 fps

by @ecomfort_arts
November 2021
